title: Terje Rypdal discography
description:
Dig the genius of Terje Rypdal
 <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terje_Rypdal" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terje_Rypdal</a>

If you want to travel in many different regions of music, then Terje Rypdal is one of the best pathfinders you could find:
Rock, fusion, jazz, third stream (that is that strange region where classical music and jazz meet).

With his aerial guitar style but not only, with his compositions spanning until avantgarde.

Through him I met a lot of stunning norwegian musicians that I will dig in the future.

Now simply enjoy this discography. 

There are 80 albums. His main production is entirely covered. You will find also many collaborations and bootlegs. 
The sampling rate is 320kbps for most of them.
Different rates are signed in the name of the albums.
Enjoy :)
